Row.Text: Demand for De-militarisation

An Ambassador from {1_CivName} has approached us with an ultimatum: we reduce the size of our armed forces, or they denounce us to the world as a military threat. Clearly, the fools in {1_CivName} have recognised our superior power. It would be damning for them to even think of denouncing us.[NEWLINE]
Perhaps we should teach them a lesson.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]War is declared against {1_CivName}[ENDCOLOR]
We have determined that the best course of action is by declaring war against {1_CivName}.
Then we shall reduce the size of our arms... for now.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]All Military Units not garrisoned in a city are disbanded (unless of level 3 or higher)[ENDCOLOR]
We have agreed to {1_CivName}'s demands that we must reduce the size of our forces.
They're bluffing...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]50% chance that {1_CivName} will denounce you[ENDCOLOR]
We have called {1_CivName}'s bluff and stood by our armament. We knew they were too weak to denounce us.
As it so happens, {1_CivName} was not bluffing and they have denounced our refusal to de-militarise. We shall teach them a lesson in time.
War has erupted between Germany and {1_CivName} in defiance of {2_LeaderName}'s demands for Adolf Hitler to de-militarise.
Adolf Hitler of Germany has agreed to the demands of {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} and has pledged to de-militarise.
Adolf Hitler of Germany has called {1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName}'s bluff and they have failed to denounce Germany's armament as promised.
New Propaganda

New propaganda material has been drawn up ready to promote the glorious will of the Führer. What is only left is to determine what the Führer's glorious will is and how this propaganda should be directed.[NEWLINE]
Well, let me tell you...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person of your choice[ENDCOLOR]
We have been presented with new propaganda material.
